name: Reunion In Magic World
description:
Instructions:
1) WASD: Control Movement
2) Mouse: Wand Direction
3) Left Click: Shoot Magic Bullets
Lingzhu, these blue magic bullets on the map, are only visible under the glow of the magic wand. Lingzhu can only be shoot after being touched and absorbed by the wand.

Files:

  • GGJ2021(Exe, SourceCode&CC).rar: it includes the CC license and some folds. src fold includes the project and source code. release fold includes the package of the executable file. 
  • GGJ2021.zip: Uncompress it and run the GGJ2021.exe. Then you can play.
